title: A.R. Rahman’s 2025 North American Tour Dates: How to Get Tickets
description: A.R. Rahman’s “The Wonderment Tour” will make stops in cities across North America this summer. Learn how to get tickets here. A.R. Rahman’s 2025 North American Tour Dates: How to Get Tickets Jo Vito
author: Jo Vito
excerpt: A.R. Rahman has announced North American tour dates for summer 2025. See the full list of shows and learn how to get tickets.
text: A.R. Rahman has announced “The Wonderment Tour,” a 16-date tour that will take the Indian superstar to cities across North America in Summer 2025. The shows begin on July 18th in Vancouver, followed by performances in Oakland, California; Toronto; Hoffman Estates, Illinois; Newark, New Jersey; and more. Get tickets here, and scroll below for more details, including a full list of dates. Get A.R. Rahman Tickets Here How Do I Get Tickets to A.R. Rahman’s 2025 North American Tour? Tickets for A.R. Rahman’s 2025 North American tour are now available. Fans can find deals and get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 110% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. What Is A.R. Rahman’s Next Tour? A.R. Rahman’s 2025 North American tour — dubbed “The Wonderment Tour” — will bring the Indian superstar to 16 cities across the US and Canada. Drawing from his rich discography of international hits, the performances will feature songs sung in Hindi, Tamil, and English, including “Jai Ho” (the Oscar-winning song from Slumdog Millionaire), “Kyu Faya Kun,” “Chaiyya Chaiyya,” “Uyire,” “Urvashi Urvashi,” “Snehithudaa,” and others. Additionally, the shows will be presented with Rahman’s signature stage design, with “cutting-edge visuals, masterful orchestrations, and immersive storytelling in a unique cinematic format.” The tour kicks off on July 18th in Vancouver, followed by performances in Tacoma, Washington; Oakland, California; Los Angeles; Sugar Land, Texas; Grand Prairie, Texas; Fairfax, Virginia; Nashville, Tennessee; Toronto; Hoffman Estates, Illinois; Newark, New Jersey; and more, before wrapping with a final show in Boston on August 17th. See the full list of A.R. Rahman’s upcoming tour dates below, and grab your tickets here. A.R. Rahman 2025 Tour Dates: 07/18 – Vancouver, BC @ Pacific Coliseum 07/20 – Tacoma, WA @ Tacoma Dome 07/25 – Oakland, CA @ Oakland Arena 07/26 – Los Angeles, CA @ Crypto.com Arena 07/29 – Sugar Land, TX @ Smart Financial Centre 07/30 – Grand Prairie, TX @ TTCU Theatre 08/02 – Raleigh, NC @ Lenovo Center 08/03 – Fairfax, VA @ EagleBank Arena 08/05 – Duluth, GA @ Gas South Arena 08/07 – Hollywood, FL @ Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Hollywood 08/08 – Tampa, FL @ Amalie Arena 08/10 – Nashville, TN @ Grand Ole Opry 08/12 – Toronto, ON @ Scotiabank Arena 08/14 – Hoffman Estates, IL @ NOW Arena 08/16 – Newark, NJ @ Prudential Center 08/17 – Boston, MA @ Agganis Arena
html:
A.R. Rahman has announced “The Wonderment Tour,” a 16-date tour that will take the Indian superstar to cities across North America in Summer 2025.

The shows begin on July 18th in Vancouver, followed by performances in Oakland, California; Toronto; Hoffman Estates, Illinois; Newark, New Jersey; and more. Get tickets here, and scroll below for more details, including a full list of dates.

Get A.R. Rahman Tickets Here

How Do I Get Tickets to A.R. Rahman’s 2025 North American Tour?

Tickets for A.R. Rahman’s 2025 North American tour are now available. Fans can find deals and get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 110% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

What Is A.R. Rahman’s Next Tour?

A.R. Rahman’s 2025 North American tour — dubbed “The Wonderment Tour” — will bring the Indian superstar to 16 cities across the US and Canada. Drawing from his rich discography of international hits, the performances will feature songs sung in Hindi, Tamil, and English, including “Jai Ho” (the Oscar-winning song from Slumdog Millionaire), “Kyu Faya Kun,” “Chaiyya Chaiyya,” “Uyire,” “Urvashi Urvashi,” “Snehithudaa,” and others.

Additionally, the shows will be presented with Rahman’s signature stage design, with “cutting-edge visuals, masterful orchestrations, and immersive storytelling in a unique cinematic format.”

The tour kicks off on July 18th in Vancouver, followed by performances in Tacoma, Washington; Oakland, California; Los Angeles; Sugar Land, Texas; Grand Prairie, Texas; Fairfax, Virginia; Nashville, Tennessee; Toronto; Hoffman Estates, Illinois; Newark, New Jersey; and more, before wrapping with a final show in Boston on August 17th.

See the full list of A.R. Rahman’s upcoming tour dates below, and grab your tickets here.

A.R. Rahman 2025 Tour Dates:
07/18 – Vancouver, BC @ Pacific Coliseum
07/20 – Tacoma, WA @ Tacoma Dome
07/25 – Oakland, CA @ Oakland Arena
07/26 – Los Angeles, CA @ Crypto.com Arena
07/29 – Sugar Land, TX @ Smart Financial Centre
07/30 – Grand Prairie, TX @ TTCU Theatre
08/02 – Raleigh, NC @ Lenovo Center
08/03 – Fairfax, VA @ EagleBank Arena
08/05 – Duluth, GA @ Gas South Arena
08/07 – Hollywood, FL @ Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Hollywood
08/08 – Tampa, FL @ Amalie Arena
08/10 – Nashville, TN @ Grand Ole Opry
08/12 – Toronto, ON @ Scotiabank Arena
08/14 – Hoffman Estates, IL @ NOW Arena
08/16 – Newark, NJ @ Prudential Center
08/17 – Boston, MA @ Agganis Arena
